#Preliminares
```{r message = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
```


#Verbos de dplyr

## select para elegir columnas

```{r}
library(gapminder)
names(gapminder)
```


```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  select(lifeExp, gdpPercap) %>%  
  tail(5)
```


```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  select(country:pop, -year)
```

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  select(starts_with("c"))
```


## Filter para elegir filas

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(country == "Spain", year == 1982)
```


```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == "1997") %>% 
  top_n(wt = gdpPercap,n = 5) %>% 
  select(-continent) %>% 
  arrange(desc(gdpPercap))

```


## Mutate para crear nuevas variables

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  mutate(gdp = gdpPercap * pop /10^6) %>% 
  select(-continent, -lifeExp) %>%
  filter(year == 1982) %>% 
  sample_n(6)
  
```


```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  mutate(gdp = gdpPercap * pop /10^6) %>% 
  mutate_at("gdp", log10)
```


## Summarize para describir los datos

```{r}
iris %>% 
  summarize(medPL = median(Petal.Length),
            mean = mean(Petal.Length))
```
##group_by

```{r}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarize(medPL = median(Petal.Length),
            mean = mean(Petal.Length))
```


```{r}
mpg %>% 
  group_by(manufacturer, cyl) %>% 
  summarize(urbano = mean(cty), n = n())
```


## count()

```{r}
mpg %>% 
  group_by(manufacturer, cyl) %>% 
  count(cyl)
```

# Estructuras de control

## If else

```{r}
(dado = sample(1:6, 1))
if(dado == 5) {
  resultado = "ganas"
  
} else {
  resultado = "pierdes"
}

resultado

```
```{r}
ifelse(sample(1:5) == 3, yes = "se cumple", no = "no se cumple")
```

```{r}
valores = numeric(10) #creamos el vector del rama√±o previsto. Reservate espacio para un vector de 10 numeros
 for (k in 1:10){
      sorteo = sample(1:20, 1)
      print(paste0("k = ", k, ", sorteo = ", sorteo))
      if (k %in% 5:6){
        next # saltamos dos valores
      } else if (sorteo  == 1){
        print("Resultado del sorteo es 1, fin del bucle")
        break # paramos si un valor aleatorio es 1
      }
      valores[k] = sorteo # se ejecuta cuando no se cumplan las condiciones
    } 
    valores
```
## while

```{r}
# Ejemplo de bucle while
k = 0
while (k < 4){
  k = k + 1
  print(k)
  if(sample(1:6, 1) == 6){
    print("Final prematuro")
    break()
  } 
}
```
